description.activeText: The reciter has failed one or more of its initialization self-tests.
description.inactiveText: Reciter Power-Up Fail condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: Exciter Synth Out of Lock Cleared

description.activeText: The exciter synthesizer is unable to lock on to the frequency it is configured to operate at.
description.inactiveText: Exciter Synth Out of Lock condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: Clock Synth Out of Lock Cleared

description.activeText: One or more of the DSP and sampling clocks are out of lock.
description.inactiveText: Clock Synth Out of Lock condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: RX Synth Out of Lock Cleared

description.activeText: The receiver synthesizer is unable to lock on to the frequency it is configured to operate at.
description.inactiveText: RX Synth Out of Lock condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: An invalid channel number was selected.
description.inactiveText: The channel selected is now valid.

description.activeText: The temperature of the reciter has exceeded the built-in threshold of 162.5 deg F (72.5 deg C).
description.inactiveText: The temperature of the reciter has returned to a normal level.

description.activeText: The reciter cannot operate properly because the digital board does not have valid calibration settings.
description.inactiveText: Calibration settings are now valid.

description.activeText: The reciter configuration data has become corrupted.
description.inactiveText: Configuration settings are now valid.

description.activeText: The base station is not ready to transmit because the exciter training sequence is in progress.
description.inactiveText: The base station is now ready to transmit.

description.activeText: The PA's Voltage Standing Wave Ratio (VSWR) is above the configured threshold.
description.inactiveText: The PA's Voltage Standing Wave Ratio (VSWR) has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PA forward power output is below the configured minimum limit.
description.inactiveText: The PA forward power output has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PA reverse power output is above the configured maximum limit.
description.inactiveText: The PA reverse power output has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The temperature in the PA's final 1 output stage has exceeded the configured threshold.
description.inactiveText: The temperature in the PA's final 1 output stage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The temperature in the PA's final 2 output stage has exceeded the configured threshold.
description.inactiveText: The temperature in the PA's final 2 output stage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The temperature in the PA's driver output stage has exceeded the configured threshold.
description.inactiveText: The temperature in the PA's driver output stage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PA has detected a fault condition and disabled the transmitter to prevent damage.
description.inactiveText: The PA has returned to normal operation.

description.activeText: The driver is drawing excessive current.
description.inactiveText: The driver's current draw has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The current in the PA's final 1 output stage has exceeded a fixed limit.
description.inactiveText: The current in the PA's final 1 output stage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The current in the PA's final 2 output stage has exceeded a fixed limit.
description.inactiveText: The current in the PA's final 2 output stage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The supply voltage has exceeded a fixed limit.
description.inactiveText: The supply voltage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The supply voltage has fallen below a fixed limit.
description.inactiveText: The supply voltage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: PA self-test indicates that settings stored in firmware have values outside acceptable limits.
description.inactiveText: Calibration has returned to normal.

description.activeText: Hardware configuration is invalid.
description.inactiveText: Configuration has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PA has detected a fault condition and has reduced its power output to a low level to prevent damage.
description.inactiveText: Foldback condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: One of the PA's final stages is drawing significantly more current than the other.
description.inactiveText: PA's final stages' current draw has equalized.

description.activeText: The PA turned its fan on, but the reciter did not detect any fan motion.
description.inactiveText: PA fan has returned to normal function.

description.activeText: The firmware in the PA is invalid.
description.inactiveText: The firmware in the PA is valid.

description.activeText: The mains power supply to the PMU is absent or its voltage is outside acceptable limits.
description.inactiveText: The mains power supply to the PMU has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The voltage of the DC power supply to the PMU is higher than the configured maximum.
description.inactiveText: The voltage of the DC power supply to the PMU has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The voltage of the DC power supply to the PMU is lower than the configured minimum.
description.inactiveText: The voltage of the DC power supply to the PMU has returned to normal.

description.activeText: Battery Protection Mode is on.
description.inactiveText: Battery Protection Mode is off.

description.activeText: Battery voltage has fallen below the configured power shutdown voltage.
description.inactiveText: Battery voltage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: One of the PMU temperature sensors has detected a temperature that is above the fixed limit.
description.inactiveText: PMU Temperature has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PMU's DC output voltage is higher than the fixed maximum.
description.inactiveText: The PMU's DC output voltage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PMU's DC output voltage is lower than the fixed minimum.
description.inactiveText: The PMU's DC output voltage has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PMU's DC output current is abnormally high and is automatically lowering its output voltage.
description.inactiveText: The PMU's DC output current has returned to normal.

description.activeText: During startup, the PMU detected an internal error and will reset itself.
description.inactiveText: PMU self-test has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The PMU turned its fan on, but the reciter did not detect any fan motion.
description.inactiveText: PMU fan has returned to normal function.

description.activeText: The firmware in the PMU is invalid.
description.inactiveText: The firmware in the PMU is valid.

description.activeText: A Base Station alarm condition exists.
description.inactiveText: Base Station alarm condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: A Reciter alarm condition exists.
description.inactiveText: Reciter alarm condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: A Power Amplifier alarm condition exists.
description.inactiveText: Power Amplifier alarm condition no longer exists.

name.inactiveText: Power Management Unit Summary Alarm Cleared

description.activeText: A Power Management Unit alarm condition exists.
description.inactiveText: Power Management Unit alarm condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: An ASIF alarm condition exists.
description.inactiveText: ASIF alarm condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: The reciter has not received a response from the PMU over the control bus.
description.inactiveText: PMU is responding normally.

description.activeText: The reciter has not received a response from the PA over the control bus.
description.inactiveText: PA is responding normally.

description.activeText: The intake air temperature has exceeded the configured maximum.
description.inactiveText: The intake air temperature has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The intake air temperature has fallen below the configured minimum.
description.inactiveText: The intake air temperature has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The base station did not detect an external reference frequency source.
description.inactiveText: External reference frequency source has returned to normal.

description.activeText: An external reference frequency is connected, but the base station cannot lock on to its channel frequency using that reference.
description.inactiveText: External reference frequency source has returned to normal.

description.activeText: An ASIF Comms Failure condition exists.
description.inactiveText: ASIF Comms Failure condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: The base station is not receiving a 1PPS pulse.
description.inactiveText: 1PPS pulse has been re-established.

description.activeText: The transmitter is unsynchronized.
description.inactiveText: The transmitter has been re-synchronized.

description.activeText: The Bit Error Rate of the incoming signal exceeded the alarm threshold of 1%.
description.inactiveText: The Bit Error Rate of the incoming signal has returned to normal.

description.activeText: A Late Packets condition exists.
description.inactiveText: Late Packets condition no longer exists.

description.activeText: The number of lost packets in the incoming voice stream has exceeded one or more of the configured thresholds.
description.inactiveText: The number of lost packets has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The incoming voice stream has a delay variation greater than the configured threshold.
description.inactiveText: The incoming voice stream delay variation has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The network board configuration data has become corrupted.
description.inactiveText: The network board configuration data has returned to normal.

description.activeText: The reciter cannot operate properly because the network board does not have valid calibration settings.
description.inactiveText: The network board calibration settings have returned to normal.

description.activeText: A Custom Alarm 1 condition exists.
description.inactiveText: Custom Alarm 1 condition no longer exists.

description.inactiveText: Custom Alarm 2 condition no longer exists.
